alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 11:43PM EDT until March 27 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR FAYETTE...WESTERN HENRY AND CLAYTON COUNTIES... At 1143 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fayetteville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Lake City, Woolsey, Lake Spivey, Rex, Starrs Mill, Inman, Fort Gillem, Bonanza, Atlanta Motor Speedway and Jw Smith Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
